title: Egypte
creator_credit: Al Razutis, John Taylor, Peter Jones, Don Worobey and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Time-lapse photography, combined with chanted music, gives an impressionistic and highly moving view of the great monuments of Egypt where art and civilisation once flowered some 5,000 years ago
